meanings.definition: The quality of being exotic or foreign.
meanings.sent1: The exoticisms of the foreign land fascinated the travelers.
meanings.sent2: She was drawn to the exoticisms of different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The exoticisms in the restaurant's menu made her smile.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a collection of exoticisms from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The market was a vibrant display of colorful exoticisms.

meanings.definition: An exotic or foreign custom or trait.
meanings.sent1: The island's exoticisms included unique dances and rituals.
meanings.sent2: He embraced the exoticisms of his heritage with pride.
meanings.sent3: The exoticisms of their family gatherings always brought joy.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was a blend of different exoticisms.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of cultural exoticisms.
